channel.title: How to remove cancel button from the client
channel.description: Okay so how exactly would you remove the cancel button in the client and i don't mean the actual button sprite which could be removed through the cache the actual part where if you click in that area it will cancel your login...

EDIT: by any chance would you know how to move the area that is sensitive to the mouse click a little to the center?[/quote]
Sure, just need to change the positional value. For an exact centered position:

becomes…

if you haven’t done so for the button and text itself there’s another variable just before the drawing method for ‘login’…

becomes…

Haven’t tested but in theory it should work.

item.title: How to remove cancel button from the client
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

To remove the button and text search for:

in your client class to find the following three lines:

i1 = c / 2 + 80; aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_967.method361(i1 - 73, 16083, l1 - 20); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffffff, i1, anInt939, "Cancel", l1 + 5, true);

Quote all three lines out for the button and text to disappear. Now to remove the actual area that is sensitive to the mouse click search for:

in your client class, underneath you will see something more or less like this:

if(super.anInt26 == 1 && super.anInt27 >= i1 - 75 && super.anInt27 <= i1 + 75 && super.anInt28 >= k1 - 20 && super.anInt28 <= k1 + 20) { anInt833 = 0; myUsername = ""; myPassword = ""; }

completely quote that out.

Read full topic
item.source: How to remove cancel button from the client
